com.compendium.io.jabber
Class Jabber

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.io.jabber.Jabber
All Implemented Interfaces:
BSAuthListener, BSMessageListener, BSPresenceListener, java.util.EventListener, org.jabber.jabberbeans.ConnectionListener, org.jabber.jabberbeans.PacketListener, org.jabber.jabberbeans.RosterListener
public class Jabber
extends java.lang.Object
implements BSAuthListener, org.jabber.jabberbeans.ConnectionListener, org.jabber.jabberbeans.RosterListener, BSPresenceListener, BSMessageListener, org.jabber.jabberbeans.PacketListener

This class handles the Jabber client side connection for Compendium-Jabber messaging.

Author:
Jiri Komzak / Michelle Bachler

connect

public void connect(java.lang.String theserver,
                    java.lang.String theusername,
                    java.lang.String thepassword,
                    java.lang.String theresource)
Create a connection using the given account information and complete setup of the helper beans.

Parameters:
theserver - java.lang.String, the server for this client to connect to.
theusername - java.lang.String, the user name of the account to connect as.
thepassword - java.lang.Sting, the password of the account to connect as.
theresource - java.lang.String, the resource to use when connecting.

authError

public void authError(BSAuthEvent ae)
Event which occurs when there has been an error with autheticating the Jabber account this client tried to connect as to. It disconnects from the connection.

Specified by:
authError in interface BSAuthListener
Parameters:
ae - com.compendium.io.jabber.BSAuthEvent, the event generated by the error message from the server.
